about.title: About BibSlide
about.description1: BibSlide is a creative tool developed by Wanky Massenat to help pastors, singers, and church technical teams prepare beautiful biblical presentations with efficiency and inspiration.
about.description2: Our goal is to bring Technology and Faith together to serve God with excellence.
about.description3: With BibSlide, you can search for verses, songs, or biblical passages, and automatically transform them into PowerPoint slides (.pptx) or PDF for projection during worship. The tool is easy to use, fast, and compatible with mobile devices, computers, and projectors.
about.missionDesc: BibSlide's mission is to help churches use modern digital tools to make their spiritual communication more attractive, simple, and accessible to everyone ‚Äî without paid costs or technical complexity. We believe God's word deserves to be presented with beauty and respect.
about.developerDesc: Wanky Massenat is a doctor, developer, and passionate creator who believes in the power of God and technology. He is the founder of Wanky Academy and creator of Belmagg Company LLC. His mission is to serve God with digital skills to transform the community.
